member.name: T:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory
member.summary: RemoteMemory is the core of jZm, it handles all memory reading/writing to the game. RemoteMemory is derived from TextWriter

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.CreateThread
member.summary: Required to create a thread.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.VmOperation
member.summary: Required to perform an operation on the address space of a process

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.VmRead
member.summary: Required to read memory in a process using ReadProcessMemory.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.VmWrite
member.summary: Required to write to memory in a process using WriteProcessMemory.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.DupHandle
member.summary: Required to duplicate a handle using DuplicateHandle.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.CreateProcess
member.summary: Required to create a process.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.SetQuota
member.summary: Required to set memory limits using SetProcessWorkingSetSize.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.SetInformation
member.summary: Required to set certain information about a process, such as its priority class (see SetPriorityClass).

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.QueryInformation
member.summary: Required to retrieve certain information about a process, such as its token, exit code, and priority class (see OpenProcessToken).

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.SuspendResume
member.summary: Required to suspend or resume a process.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.QueryLimitedInformation
member.summary: Required to retrieve certain information about a process (see GetExitCodeProcess, GetPriorityClass, IsProcessInJob, QueryFullProcessImageName). A handle that has the PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION access right is automatically granted PROCESS_QUERY_LIMITED_INFORMATION.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.Synchronize
member.summary: Required to wait for the process to terminate using the wait functions.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.Delete
member.summary: Required to delete the object.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.ReadControl
member.summary: Required to read information in the security descriptor for the object, not including the information in the SACL. To read or write the SACL, you must request the ACCESS_SYSTEM_SECURITY access right. For more information, see SACL Access Right.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.WriteDac
member.summary: Required to modify the DACL in the security descriptor for the object.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.WriteOwner
member.summary: Required to change the owner in the security descriptor for the object.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteMemory.ProcessAccess.AllAccess
member.summary: All possible access rights for a process object.

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Level
member.summary: Level provides information such as how much entities are loaded, how much

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject
member.summary: Represents a game object in the memory Provides several helper functions.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.Position
member.summary: Current offset of the reader.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.Mem
member.summary: The associated object

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.Offset
member.summary: The current offset from the start of the object

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.BaseOffset
member.summary: The current offset from the beginning

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.Move(System.Int32)
member.summary: Add xxx bytes to the current position
member.param: The amount of bytes to skip

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.aInt
member.summary: Move 4 bytes

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.aLong
member.summary: Move 8 bytes

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.aVec(System.Int32)
member.summary: Move 4 * VecType bytes
member.param: Vector type (2, 3, 4)

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.aShort
member.summary: Move 2 bytes

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.RemoteObject.State
member.summary: Just a object that you can asso

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.OnFrameHandler
member.summary: Handles frame events

member.summary: Handles write events
member.param: The message to write

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.OnCrashHandler
member.summary: Handles exception events

member.summary: Handles plugin exception events

The plugin that threw the exception

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.MapHandler
member.summary: Handles map events

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.PortalHandler
member.summary: Handles portal events
member.param: The portal that triggered this event
The player that triggered this event

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.ChatHandler
member.summary: Handles chat events

The message that the player send

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.PatternRecognition
member.summary: PatternRecognition is a class that dynamically searches for addresses so when the offsets change, We don't need the hardcoded addresses anymore. Completely made by Barata, Edited slightly by JariZ

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.TeamInfo
member.summary: The teaminfo object is a object that.... holds team info?

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.TeamInfo.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Process,System.Int32,ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity)
member.summary: Initialize a new TeamInfo based on the offset.
member.remarks: DO NOT CALL FROM PLUGIN. Use to get this object.
member.param: The game process
The offset of the entity
ZombieAPI that initializes this class

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.TeamInfo.Team
member.summary: The associated gentity's Team.

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.Addresses
member.summary: Class that contains all offsets to the game's data and functions.
member.remarks: PatternRecognition will look for the right offsets for each address, so the actual addresses may vary.

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player
member.summary: Object that represents a player

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Process,System.Int32,ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity)
member.summary: Initialize a new Player based on the offset.
member.remarks: DO NOT CALL FROM PLUGIN. Use to get all players.
member.param: The game process
The offset of the entity
The entity that has created this Player

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons
member.summary: A 'category' containing settings of the player's equipment, weapons, and ammo

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.World
member.summary: A 'category' containing all world settings

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stats
member.summary: A 'category' containing stuff like the player's kills, rank, etc

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Kick(System.String)
member.summary: Remove player from game, showing a message.
member.param: The message in the dialog box to show to the player. You can use ^1color ^2codes

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.iPrintBoldLn(System.String)
member.summary: Shows a message in the top-middle of the player's screen
member.param: The message to show. You can use ^1color ^2codes

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Tell(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Send a chat message to this player. Only the player can see this message.
member.remarks: The message will show up in the player's normal chat, alongside with the other player's chat.
member.param: The message to show. You can use ^1color ^2codes
If false, remove 'Server: ' from the start of the message.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.iPrintLn(System.String)
member.summary: Send message to player's killfeed. (bottom-left box)
member.param: The message to show. You can use ^1color ^2codes

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Electrocute
member.summary: Show a short electrocute effect on the player's HUD.
member.remarks: Doesn't damage the player.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.CustomSVCMD(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Custom server command. Will be removed in the near future. Not recommended to use.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Ignite
member.summary: Show a short fire effect on the player's HUD.
member.remarks: Doesn't damage the player.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.SetClientDVar(System.String)
member.summary: Set a client-side dvar. Dvars are game engine settings.
member.remarks: To get server-side dvars, Use ZombieAPI.GetDVar()

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.ClientCommand(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Send a client command to the designated client.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.ServerCommand(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Send a servercommand to the client (or server? i don't actually know how it works)

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Perks
member.summary: Returns the player's perks

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.X2Score
member.summary: Does the player have double points? TODO: Make this a bool

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Team
member.summary: The team this player is in.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.isAlive
member.summary: Self-explainatory, Returns true if the player is alive, false if he/she is dead.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.inSecondChance
member.summary: Is player in second chance (aka down) TODO: Change this to a bool

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stance
member.summary: Contains the player's stance, examples are Running, Standing, Aiming down sights, etc

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.ClientNum
member.summary: The entity's index, ranging from 0 to 1024

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.ModelIndex
member.summary: The model index.
member.remarks: Perhaps in a later build it'll be possible to get the model name. Currently I have no clue what it refers to.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Name
member.summary: The player's username.
member.remarks: DO NOT use names if you're gonna 'hardcode' players into your plugin. People will be able to change their name and spoof these players. Instead, use for a unique non-spoofable identification number.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.XUID
member.summary: The player's unique identification number.
member.remarks: If you want to hardcode players into your plugin, This'll be the way. DO NOT use names if you're gonna hardcode players.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Money
member.summary: The player's score.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Health
member.summary: The player's health, ranging from 0 to 190 (by default unless Player.MaxHealth is changed)

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.MaxHealth
member.summary: The player's maximum health.
member.remarks: Note that the game automatically 'heals' the player to amount of health as well.

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_
member.summary: A 'category' containing settings of the player's equipment, weapons, and ammo

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.PrimaryWeapon
member.summary: The player's primary weapon's (the player's first weapon slot) name.
member.remarks: To get a clear view of what weapons are being used (and to be sure this won't throw an exception), Use
member.exception: Thrown when an invalid weapon is specified

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.SecondaryWeapon
member.summary: The player's secondary weapon's (the player's second weapon slot) name.
member.remarks: To get a clear view of what weapons are being used (and to be sure this won't throw an exception), Use
member.exception: Thrown when an invalid weapon is specified

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.LethalWeapon
member.summary: The player's lethal weapon's name. (smoke grenades etc)
member.remarks: To get a clear view of what weapons are being used (and to be sure this won't throw an exception), Use
member.exception: Thrown when an invalid weapon is specified

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.CurrentWeapon
member.summary: The current weapon the player is using right now.
member.remarks: To get a clear view of what weapons are being used (and to be sure this won't throw an exception), Use
member.exception: Thrown when an invalid weapon is specified

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.TacticalWeapon
member.summary: The player's tactical weapon (grenades etc)
member.remarks: To get a clear view of what weapons are being used (and to be sure this won't throw an exception), Use
member.exception: Thrown when an invalid weapon is specified

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.PrimaryAmmoClip
member.summary: The amount of bullets currently in the primary weapon's clip

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.SecondaryAmmoClip
member.summary: The amount of bullets currently in the secondary weapon's clip

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.PrimaryAmmoStock
member.summary: The amount of bullets currently in the primary weapon's stock

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.SecondaryAmmoStock
member.summary: The amount of bullets currently in the primary weapon's clip

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.TacticalAmmo
member.summary: The amount of tactical weapons currently in the tactical weapon slot.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Weapons_.LethalAmmo
member.summary: The amount of lethal weapons currently in the lethal weapon slot.

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.World_
member.summary: A 'category' containing all world settings

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.World_.Freeze
member.summary: If true, the player won't be able to move or look around.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.World_.Speed
member.summary: The player's speed. Default is 190

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.World_.SpeedScale
member.summary: The multiplier of the Speed amount

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.World_.Velocity
member.summary: The player's velocity (Vec3)

member.summary: The location of the player in the world (Vec3)

member.summary: The angle of the player's camera (Vec3)

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.World_.PlayerHeight
member.summary: The player's camera height from the ground

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.World_.Gravity
member.summary: The player's gravity Default is 800

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stats_
member.summary: A 'category' containing stuff like the player's kills, rank, etc

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stats_.Rank
member.summary: The player's rank
member.remarks: You're able to write to this value, but I won't recommend it.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stats_.Prestige
member.summary: The player's prestige
member.remarks: You're able to write to this value, but I won't recommend it.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stats_.Deaths
member.summary: The amount of times the player's been death

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stats_.Kills
member.summary: The amount of kills the player has made

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stats_.Assists
member.summary: The amount of Assists the player has

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.Player.Stats_.Headshots
member.summary: The amount of headshots the player has

member.summary: The amount of Revives

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity
member.summary: A entity used in the game.
member.remarks: Entities are pretty much all things that aren't part of the map.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Process,System.Int32,ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI)
member.summary: Initialize a new GEntity based on the offset.
member.remarks: DO NOT CALL FROM PLUGIN. Use to get all entities.
member.param: The game process
The offset of the entity
ZombieAPI that initializes this class

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.Parent
member.summary: The ZombieAPI that created this class.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.Player
member.summary: If the entity is a player, this will return the object.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.Team
member.summary: TeamInfo object containing the Entity's team.
member.remarks: Pretty much only the Players actually use this.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.ClientNum
member.summary: The entity's index, ranging from 0 to 1024

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.Stance
member.summary: In what stance is this entity?
member.remarks: May return other numbers than defined in the Stances enum on entities that aren't players (for example zombies etc)

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.Origin
member.summary: The location on the map of this Entity

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.Angles
member.summary: The angles of this entity.
member.remarks: Returns a Vec2 with 2 values both ranging from 0 to 360. Can both also be negative.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.CurrentWeapon
member.summary: Current weapon being used.
member.remarks: Only used by players.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.newOrigin
member.summary: Not sure what this is, If you've got any idea, contact me. D:

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.ModelIndex
member.summary: The model index.
member.remarks: Perhaps in a later build it'll be possible to get the model name. Currently I have no clue what it refers to.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.Health
member.summary: The entity's health.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.GEntity.Type
member.summary: The entity type, ranges from player to barrier.

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.DVar
member.summary: The DVar class represents a DVar in the game.
member.remarks: DVars are 'settings' used by the game engine. Every DVar has a name and a value.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.DVar.#ctor(System.Diagnostics.Process,System.Int32,ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI)
member.summary: Initializes a new DVar object

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.DVar.Name
member.summary: The DVar name referenced by the game engine

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.DVar.Desc
member.summary: The description, Very often empty.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.DVar.Type
member.summary: The type of DVar you'll use the get it's value. Can be an Integer, Bool, String, Float, Vector, UnsignedInteger.

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.DVar.DVarValue
member.summary: A dynamic class that allows you to get the DVar's value in several formats
member.remarks: It is recommended, however, to just get the right corresponding value according to the DVar Type.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.GameObjects.DVar.DVarValue.Value
member.summary: Will return a string/bool/float/etc depending on the DVar's type

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.jZmPlugin
member.summary: The public interface used for all jZm plugins and a starting point for everyone working with the API.
member.remarks: Note that your class should be named 'Plugin' and nothing else if you want it to get loaded by the PluginLoader.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.jZmPlugin.Init(ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI)
member.summary: Gets called right after loading the plugin. You're supposed to initialize your plugin here.
member.remarks: The only call used by jZm. If you want to get notified of any other jZm events, Create eventhandlers.
member.param: The jZm API you can use to manipulate the game.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.jZmPlugin.Name
member.summary: The plugin name

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.jZmPlugin.Author
member.summary: Your name.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.jZmPlugin.Desc
member.summary: Short description on what your plugin does.

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.I
member.summary: Shorthand WINAPI imports

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI
member.summary: The publicy available API to all plugin.

member.name: F:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Version
member.summary: jZm version, format: x.x.x.x-BUILD

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Write a line to the jZm console.
member.param: The message that will be written to the console

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.WriteLine(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: A overload for diagnostic messages. Works the same as WriteLine
member.param: The message that will be written to the console
Doesn't matter what you pass to this parameter, It'll be send to the debug event.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Write a message to the jZm console.
member.param: The message that will be written to the console

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.#ctor
member.summary: If you're trying to do this from a plugin, you're doing it wrong. Use the Init(ZombieAPI) function to get the ZombieAPI object.

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.GetBus
member.summary: Gets the bus on transit.
member.remarks: Returns the first ET_VEHICLE it can find.
member.returns: The first ET_VEHICLE it can find. KEEP IN MIND THAT: If none found, It'll return null (this means on all non-transit maps)

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.GetDVar(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the corresponding DVar object that has this name
member.param: The DVar name
member.returns: The DVar object as requested, when not found, It'll be null

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.GetDVarValue(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the corresponding DVar value that has this name
member.param: The DVar name
member.returns: The DVar value as requested, when not found, It'll be null

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.GetActors
member.summary: Loops trough all entities, returning only the actors (zombies and other NPC's)

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.GetBarriers
member.summary: Returns all Zombie Barriers (the zombie entrances)

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.GetScriptMovers
member.summary: Loops trough all entities, returning only the models (keep in mind that these are not static and can be moved)

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Crash(System.Exception)
member.summary: Invokes the OnCrash event, resulting in a fatal error. Mostly used internally.
member.param: The exception you want to show details for to the user

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Bootstrap(System.Diagnostics.Process)
member.summary: Initializes jZm onto a certain game process. Make sure the game is the correct process, This function doesn't check if the process is correct.
member.remarks: DO NOT CALL FROM A PLUGIN. This function is called from the jZm frontend and you should not call it from a plugin.
member.param: The game process jZm reads/writes to (must be a valid CODBOII zombies process)

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.GetPlayers
member.summary: Get all clients in the server.
member.remarks: One of the most important functions in jZm

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Shutdown(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Unloads resources, Removes hooks and exits the environment.
member.param: Run after unloading everything

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.OnFrame
member.summary: Called on every jZm tick. Gets called 5 times a second.

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.OnWrite
member.summary: Internally used by jZm frontend to respond to ZombieAPI.Write call

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.OnDebugWrite
member.summary: Same as OnWrite, will print in another color to console.

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.OnCrash
member.summary: Called whenever jZm occures a fatal error from which it cannot recover. Not meant for plugins.

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.OnPluginCrash
member.summary: Called whenever a plugin throws a unhandled exception. Not meant for plugins.

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.OnMapLoad
member.summary: Calls whenever the gamedata gets loaded.
member.remarks: Keep in mind that it actually takes a few more seconds before the players are actually able to play and still may be staring at their loading screens.

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.OnMapDestroy
member.summary: Call whenever the gamedata gets removed. Basically whenever the user returns to the main menu.

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.OnChat
member.summary: Calls when a player sends a chat message

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Header
member.summary: First thing shown on startup on console, provides name, description, version and credits.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Level
member.summary: The current level information

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Entities
member.summary: All Entities in the game.
member.remarks: Use the several functions to filter these entities

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Weapons
member.summary: All currently loaded weapons in the game.
member.remarks: The key is the WeaponID, The value is the weapon name

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Plugins
member.summary: All currently loaded plugins. Mostly used internally.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.DVars
member.summary: All the DVars that the game currently has.
member.remarks: DVars are the game's "settings".

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.ExecutablePath
member.summary: The name of the executable that's running jZm.

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.ZombieAPI.Portals
member.summary: The Portals currently monitored by jZm

member.name: T:ZombieAPI.Portal
member.summary: The Portal utilty class enables you to easily teleport players to a certain location when they step into a certain area

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.Portal.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: The Portal utilty class enables you to easily teleport players to a certain location when they step into a certain area
member.param: The X coordinate that'll be used as location of the portal
The Y coordinate that'll be used as location of the portal
The radius (area) the player needs to get in to be teleported

member.name: M:ZombieAPI.Portal.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Single[])
member.summary: The Portal utilty class enables you to easily teleport players to a certain location when they step into a certain area
member.param: The X coordinate that'll be used as location of the portal
The Y coordinate that'll be used as location of the portal
The radius (area) the player needs to get in to be teleported
Will the player get teleported to once triggered?
A Vec3 (float array with 3 values) that specifies where players will be teleported into.

member.name: E:ZombieAPI.Portal.PortalTriggered
member.summary: Gets triggered whenever a player steps into this portal

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.Portal.Radius
member.summary: The radius (area) the player needs to get in to be teleported

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.Portal.X
member.summary: The X coordinate that'll be used as location of the portal

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.Portal.Y
member.summary: The Y coordinate that'll be used as location of the portal

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.Portal.Teleport
member.summary: Will the player get teleported to once triggered?

member.name: P:ZombieAPI.Portal.Destination
member.summary: A Vec3 (float array with 3 values) that specifies where players will be teleported into.
member.remarks: Will only be used if is true
